檋字的基本解释

檋
jū
上山穿的钉鞋；一说上山坐的滑竿一类的乘具：“泥行乘橇，山行乘檋。”

檋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《集韻》拘玉切，入燭，見。］
山行用具。《史记·夏本纪》：“山行乘檋。”裴駰集解引如淳曰：“檋車，謂以鐵如錐頭，長半寸，施之履下，以上山不蹉跌也。”张守节正义：“上山，前齒短，後齒長；下山，前齒長，後齒短也。”清姚鼐《信阳》诗：“水源四瀆思乘檋，地險三關每荷戈。”一说为山轿。参阅清俞正燮《癸已存稿》卷一。

檋字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檋； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第21
【集韻】拘玉切，音臼。【史記·河渠書·乗橋註】作檋。徐廣曰：直轅車也。詳橋字註。亦同梮。詳梮字註。

檋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檋字的起名意思

暂无。

檋
Basic explanation of words
檋
jū
Spikes for going uphill; a ride like a sliding rod for going uphill: "Mud rides on sleds, mountain rides on sleds."
檋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Jiyun" Juyu cut, enter the candle, see. ]
Mountain hiking equipment. "Historical Records·Xia Benji": "Mountain travels and rides." Pei Qi set an explanation and quote Ruchun said: "The chariot is like a cone and is half an inch long. It is used under the foot of the mountain, and the mountain will not fall." Zhang Keeping the festival justice: "Go up the mountain, the front teeth are short, and the back teeth are long; down the mountain, the front teeth are long, and the back teeth are short." Qing Yaonai's poem "Xinyang": "The water source is four dungeons, and the earth is dangerous. "One said it was a mountain sedan chair. Refer to Volume 1 of Qing Yu Zhengxie's "Gui Saved Manuscript".
檋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檋; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 21
【Jiyun】Juyu cut, sound mortar. 【Historical Records·Hequ Book·Annotation on Bridges】Completed. Xu Guang said: Straight-wheeled cars are also. Detailed bridge word note. Also the same. Detailed note of the word.
檋

Nothing.

сущ.

2) колодка с шипами (надевалась на обувь для хождения по горам)
